definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
6th earthly branch: 9-11 a.m., 4th solar month (5th May-5th June), year of the Snake/ancient Chinese compass point: 150°

sentences.english: He must be too afraid to tell me what happened.
sentences.chinese: 他議定書太害怕了所以纔不敢告訴我真囘相。

sentences.english: He ran back to Mom's bedroom.
Because last night I heard moan from the antique shop.
sentences.chinese: 因爲昨天晚上我聽到隔壁傳來呻囘吟聲。

sentences.english: Love is something that only takes faith to have.
sentences.chinese: 愛情這囘事，只要相信就能擁有。

sentences.english: The all these miss any further return not.
sentences.chinese: 這一切如果錯過就再也囘不來。

sentences.english: He must be a psycho taking delight in torturing others.
sentences.chinese: 他肯定是一個以虐囘待他人爲樂趣的變囘態。

sentences.english: He must be a psycho taking delight in torturing others.
sentences.chinese: 他肯定是一個以虐囘待他人爲樂趣的變囘態。

definition: two bunches of hair on a child
thick grass/"bush" component in Chinese characters
